testCases.name: Basic changelog with two versions (GitHub Actions format)
testCases.expectedOutput:
entry<<EOF
### Added
- New feature X
- New feature Y
### Fixed
- Bug fix A
EOF

testCases.name: Basic changelog with two versions (Plain format)
testCases.expectedOutput:
### Added
- New feature X
- New feature Y
### Fixed
- Bug fix A

testCases.name: Empty changelog content between versions
testCases.expectedOutput:
entry<<EOF
No changelog entries found for the latest version
EOF

testCases.name: Changelog with no version headers
testCases.expectedOutput:
entry<<EOF
No changelog entries found for the latest version
EOF

testCases.name: Changelog with complex formatting and special characters
testCases.expectedOutput:
entry<<EOF
### Added
- Feature with `code blocks`
- Feature with **bold** text
- Feature with [links](https://example.com)
### Changed
- Modified behavior for special chars: $, %, &, @
### Security
- Fixed XSS vulnerability in `render()` function
EOF

testCases.name: Changelog with multi-line entries
testCases.expectedOutput:
entry<<EOF
### Added
- New API endpoint `/api/v2/users` that supports:
  - User creation
  - User modification
  - Bulk operations
- Enhanced error handling with detailed messages
### Fixed
- Issue where long commit messages would cause
  workflow failures due to shell escaping
EOF

testCases.name: Real-world changelog format
testCases.expectedOutput:
entry<<EOF
### Added
- Introduced a comprehensive 'Automated Workflows' section in the README.md to enhance visibility into CI/CD processes and development workflows.
- Created AGENTS.md for AI agent guidance, detailing project structure, API patterns, and development workflow standards.
### Changed
- Refactored CI workflows to modernize and streamline processes, removing legacy workflows and improving organization with new directories for actions and prompts.
### Fixed
- Resolved multiple issues related to handling nested changes in PR enhancement workflows, ensuring proper formatting and readability of AI-generated content.
---
EOF

testCases.name: Changelog with different version patterns
testCases.expectedOutput:
entry<<EOF
### Added
- Version with 'v' prefix
EOF

errorTestCases.name: Invalid output format
errorTestCases.expectedOutput: [ERROR] Invalid output format: invalid. Must be 'github-actions' or 'plain'

helpTestCase.name: Help output
helpTestCase.expectedOutput:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------- #
 ðŸ“  Extract Latest Changelog Entry                                         #
--------------------------------------------------------------------------- #

Extracts the latest changelog entry from CHANGELOG.md for use in release
PR descriptions. This script replaces the inline AWK logic from the 
release-pr.yml workflow to improve testability and maintainability.

Usage:
  ./extract-changelog-entry.sh [OPTIONS]

Options:
  --file <path>     Path to changelog file (default: CHANGELOG.md)
  --output-format   Format: 'github-actions' (default) or 'plain'
  --debug          Enable debug output
  --help           Show this help message

GitHub Actions Output:
  When --output-format=github-actions (default), outputs in the format:
  entry<<EOF
  <changelog content>
  EOF

Plain Output:
  When --output-format=plain, outputs just the changelog content

Exit Codes:
  0 - Success
  1 - Changelog file not found
  2 - No changelog entries found
  3 - Invalid changelog format

Author: tkozzer
